text: Soup are a post rock band from Trondheim, Norway and were founded in 2004 by the Norwegian based multi-instrumentalist Erlend Viken as an outlet for his song writing and compositional talents. Soup's music has been likened by some critics to that of Steven Wilson, Sigur Ros, Mogwai, Explosions In The Sky among others ==Discography== * Give It An Empire (2004) * Children Of E.L.B. (2010) * Entropia (2012) * The Beauty Of Our Youth (2013) * DUUN (2013) * Remedies (2017) * Live Cuts (2018) ==References== * * * * Category:Norwegian post-rock groups Category:Norwegian progressive rock groups Category:Norwegian alternative rock groups
title: Soup (band)
